testCases.label: Verify int_to_float converts integers to floats
testCases.description: Checks that int_to_float(5) produces a float value and that the numerical result is 5.0.

testCases.label: Verify float_to_int converts floats to integers
testCases.description: Ensures that float_to_int(3.14) returns an int and truncates the value correctly to 3.

testCases.label: Verify str_to_int converts numeric strings to integers
testCases.description: Validates that str_to_int("10") yields an int with value 10, demonstrating proper string-to-int conversion.

testCases.label: Verify str_to_float converts numeric strings to floats
testCases.description: Confirms that str_to_float("3.14") returns a float representation of the value 3.14.

testCases.label: Verify int_to_str converts integers to strings
testCases.description: Checks that int_to_str(10) produces the string "10", confirming proper int-to-string conversion.

testCases.label: Verify float_to_str converts floats to strings
testCases.description: Ensures that float_to_str(3.14) returns the string "3.14" as expected in this labâ€™s type-conversion exercises.
